newArrivalList.author: Movie Jabber
newArrivalList.description: Otamatsuri is Kenya’s and Africa’s only anime, manga and Japanese pop-culture exclusive convention

newArrivalList.author: Speed dating Kenya.
newArrivalList.imgAlt: A happy hour with a twist of speed dating for single professionals.
newArrivalList.description: A cocktail party happy hour with a twist of speed dating where people will go on having fun, drinking and eating but after every 5minutes a bell is rang and you have to move to another person just to have a chat and see whether you would like to continue talking to them.

newArrivalList.author: Atheists In Kenya Society
newArrivalList.description: We are pleased to introduce our Book Club! Each month we’ll announce a new pick of a book (or a part of it) that we’ll read right alongside you and other readers. The books we read will span a range of topics — from spiritualism, philosophy, history, religion, relationships, healthy living, science, and more. So let’s jump right in!

newArrivalList.bookName: Meet Me- Ke for Kenyan Artists By Kenyan Artists
newArrivalList.author: Ndungu Mbithi
newArrivalList.imgAlt: Meet Me - For Kenyan artists by Kenyan artists
newArrivalList.description: MeetME Kenya offers you a safer way to meet and get to know other genuine, professional singers from Nairobi and all around Kenya.
